alert.note: Alert for San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 05 at 4:53AM PST until January 06 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 25 to 30 feet. * WHERE...San Francisco Peninsula Coast and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 3 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Breaking waves can sweep people off jetties and docks, and into dangerous seas. Life-threatening swimming conditions and significant beach erosion can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The ocean is an unrelenting environment with little to no chance of rescue. Respect this force of nature and remain well away from hazardous ocean conditions.
info.instruction: Everyone should remain out of the water due to life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off of jetties, piers, and other waterside infrastructure.

area.areaDesc: San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
